title: Multimodal Learning Design for Contour Map Interpretation

context.prior_knowledge: Geographical foundational concepts and map-reading skills
context.additional_context: Emphasis on field-applicable teaching skills for pre-service teachers.

learning_goals: Learners can accurately interpret contour maps and explain topographical features with over 80% accuracy
Learners can analyze complex topographical information with minimized cognitive load using multimodal (visual-auditory) materials
Learners can correct and improve contour map interpretation errors within three attempts through formative assessments
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
